title: About
text:
I‚Äôm a senior data analyst with experience building analytics platforms, dashboards, and predictive models in regulated environments.
I focus on translating messy, real-world data into tools that stakeholders actually use‚Äîwithout over-engineering.
Core strengths - Product-minded analytics (what decisions does this change?) - Reproducible reporting (Quarto / pipelines) - Clear communication (exec-ready summaries + technical depth)
Links - GitHub: https://github.com/cmrobinson1992 - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/christian-robinson-4457949a/ - Email: mailto::christian.m.robinson@gmail.com

title: Christian Robinson
text:
I build analytics products, dashboards, and ML tools that turn complex data into decisions.

View Projects Resume







Classification models estimating Hall of Fame induction probability using career, peak, and era-adjusted features.
Links:  Live App  ¬∑  Github 



Quantifying internal communication metrics, using NLP models to classify subjects for targeted educational strategies. Links:  Paper 






End-to-end data science ownership ‚Äî framing ambiguous problems, designing the right analysis or model, and delivering outputs that influence real decisions.
Modeling with intent ‚Äî selecting methods based on business constraints, data realities, and interpretability needs.
Translating complexity for stakeholders ‚Äî turning technical results into clear narratives for executives, regulators, and non-technical partners.
Production-minded analytics ‚Äî building models, forecasts, and dashboards that are reproducible, monitored, and maintainable over time.
Knowing when not to model ‚Äî applying simpler analytical approaches when they are more robust, explainable, or operationally appropriate.

title: Projects
text:
üèÜ MLB Hall of Fame Predictor
Problem: Predict Hall of Fame induction probability for current MLB players given performance through current age. Approach: Feature engineering (career + peak windows), multiple classifiers, careful evaluation, interpretability.
Result: A live, interactive app that supports scenario-style questions and exploration.
Links:
 Live App  - GitHub: https://github.com/cmrobinson1992/mlb_hof_prediction

title: Projects
text:
Communication Performance Dashboard (Practicum)
Problem: Quantify email/phone response metrics and categorize communications using NLP.
Approach: Logging/ETL + NLP classification + Shiny dashboard for exploration and reporting.
Result: A repeatable measurement system with actionable breakdowns.
